    • isValidMove

      public int isValidMove(Piece[][] board, int desRow, int desCol)
      Check whether this move is valid
      Parameters:
      board - The board this piece is on
      desRow - The destination row
      desCol - The destination column
      Returns:
      0 - invalid move 1 - valid move 2 - en passant 3 - castle
